job description:
Role – SAS Data Analyst

Location: Southfield, MI

Duration: 6 + months

Engagement Description: This role is part of the Risk Adjustment Data & Analytics Team at Tessellate. The primary responsibility will be to assist in risk adjustment reporting, risk score generation, and other ad hoc requests by various departments & clients using tools including SAS, SQL and others as needed. Other duties can include data analysis, requirements definition, solution design consulting, report design, and some testing.

Top 3 Required Skills/Experience: - Minimum 5 years of experience with data & analytic tools including but not limited to SAS, and SQL with an emphasis on data manipulation, automation, validation, creating analytic datasets, and reporting. - Familiarity with risk adjustment data including claims data, and CMS/HHS administrative data - Strong analytic skills including but not limited to: development of key performance metrics, trend analyses, and root cause analyses.

Required Skills/Experience: Ability to work on multiple projects with prioritization SQL & SAS History with medical/pharmcy claims History with CMS data MMR, MOR, RAPS, MAO4 Tableau - 2 years Power BI - 1 year Strong technical skills Independent worker Problem solver

PreferredSkills/Experience: SAS - 5 years SQL - 5 years Tableau - 2 years Power BI - 2 years

Education/Certifications: Bachelor's degree required Master's degree preferred

- provided by Dice

SAS, Data Analyst, Sql
